import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, FormGroup} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector, useStore} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' const PaymentScreen = ({history}) => { const cart= useSelector(state=>state.cart) const {shippingAddress}=cart if(!shippingAddress){ history.push('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod]= useState('Paypal') const dispatch= useDispatch() const SubmitHandler=(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history.push('/placeorder') } return (

Payment Method

Select Method setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}> setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
) } export default PaymentScreen
